oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Garnett Andrews order, 1864 November 10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Confederate States of America. War Department
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Military order that enlarges the authority of Garnett Andrews to select foreigners & prisoners of war for his battalion of infantrymen.
